title: PUNISHED FOR BUG SPLAT
body:
Riot WHAT THE ACTUAL FUUCK.
I got punished for a FKING BUG SPLAT just some minutes ago. I tried to reconnect but i was black screen all the time tried to restart but it didn't fix any shit.
I tried many times but at the end they Remaked and i ended up with a ban.
Never have I been so angry about this, someone please tell me if I can get unpenalized and how.
Thanks

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some driver or hardware failure, and it's important to get that fixed up to prevent further penalties.  [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat all leaves equally even if it is not intended because of the negative experiences it still causes for others.  I suggest going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide completely to get this fixed up and complete any lower priority queues.  Good luck!

Choosing to play a broken game gets you punished... I too have had this happen to me recently and been on both sides of it. I was able to reconnect to the game but still got penalized. We won that game btw. Having the same issues but this punishment is ridiculous. Never had any bugsplat issues BEFORE the client update but low and behold the second I update clients BOOM bugsplat, 10 minutes to reconnect after running all the troubleshooting i could, gave up and just restarted pc. Punishment for those frantically trying to relog into the game is absurd. Well you disconnected might as well stay disconnected because even if you get back into the game you are still going to be punished. Thanks ~~Obama~~ ~~Riot~~ Rito
